DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Reduce the effect of this card for each card remaining in your draw pile.
Cards from any and ALL Colors.
A Power that prevents the next time you would lose HP.
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies for each Attack drawn. Gain 6 block for each Skill drawn. Gain [E] for each Power drawn. Apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies for each Status or Curse drawn.
When you attempt to draw a card while your hand is full, you #yOverdraw that card.
The following Effects: Strength Down, Shackled, Dexterity Down, Buffer Down, Retain Cards This Turn, Blur, Thorns Down, Weak, Vulnerable.
Curse cards are negative cards that stay in your deck.
Status cards are removed at the end of combat.
